description:
One of the members of Hero`s old party. A powerful swordswoman who also excels as a commander in battle. She reunites with the Hero by accident much to her surprise, as no one had news from him since his encounter with the Demon Queen. Despite she fails to get a proper explanation from him, she joins the Crimson Scholar`s efforts to improve Human society by teaching swordsmanship to her students. The Female Knight eventually becomes a close friend to the Demon Queen, staying by her side even after learning about her true identity, but also viewing her as a rival for the hero`s affection as she also loves him.
Source: Wiki
name: Onna Kishi
